item.title: Why this blog
item.description: Why this blog You certainly ended up here while casually –stalking– checking my Linkedin Page and might be wondering what you will find here. I always wanted to start a blog for several reasons: I thought it would be fun Like you, a lot is going on up there and I want to keep my thoughts clear and organized on some subjects. I realized I had gathered a significant amount of web resources and I wanted to start organizing them: if they are not worth sharing, they are not worth keeping I “bombed” my first carrier in my early years (I am not that old) and I want to share all the lessons learned I wish someone had told me when I first graduated I want to be able to share a page on my subjects of interest with like-minded people and maybe start interesting (non/for-profit) projects together!

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am Hiro(to) Welcome to my page, this is my little place on the internet. If you’re wondering: I was born and bred in France, but both of my parents are Japanese. I learned how to balance those 2 cultures over time. I currently work in the Tech Industry as a Data Engineer / Analytics Engineer, but I initially started as a (Junior) Project Manager in the construction industry before brutally shifting my career path.

item.title: Contact
item.description: yam[dot]hiroto[at]gmail[dot]com I won’t share my phone number here, but you can send a mail or a message on Linkedin and I will see what I can do.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along!
